this_title: เมืองดาหลา
introduction: Captain's dad is the ruler of their place. He's involved in preventing drugs getting into the cities and his own villiage. He's in charge of the villiage, basically a King of his people.One day, Captain's dad gets shot by one of the soldiers. Captain comes come from abroad being very angry. He meets the man that is the boss in killing his father. That man also has a very lovely daughter which is Aom.For Captain's dad's funeral, Aom's family was invited but because her father was busy, she went with two servents. He dislikes her a lot, not knowing that she has nothing to do with her dad's business.Things happen between them and later he finally accepts that she is innocent. They fall in love and in between other things happen that involve drugs and situations of people that Captain and Aom know.
foreign_title: เมืองดาหลา
